name: Rogue Chess (Emil Ekroth)
description:
Rogue chess is a cross between speedchess and roguelikes.

This game was made for the IXD and GDT March Game Jam 2023. 

Credits:
This game was made by Emil Ekroth
Graphics by Emil Ekroth
Music by SergeQuadrado from Pixabay
Sound effects from Pixabay
Font by CodeMan38 from Google Fonts
Unity Engine

Thanks to all the testers!
Simon Skogsberg
Edwin Wigren
Carl Jansson
Martin Hultgren
Erik Götvall
Samuel Dahlborg
